descriptionHtml:
[IMG]http://i.imgur.com/oJFlOEr.png[/IMG]


I was thinking about making some package with loading screens, uploading to test.
And since I like to animate, I made this, you can check my YT cannel for more animations ;)

-   -    -   -  -   - - -- -------It actually helps with loading speeds, its only 70kb!!! ---- -- --- -   - -   -     -    -
-  -   -  -    - - - - - -  -- - ---- You can check  my Non-Enb alternative if you want a big upgrade in image quality with MINIMAL fps cost (yes, minimal, my pc sucks) [2 to 4 fps at most]
http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/38026

_He doesnt blink and doesnt cast a shadow for some Skyrim reason I dont know.
Maybe he does in your system, tell me!

INSTALLATION: Go to Data -> Interface -> and backup rename your loadingmenu.swf to something like loadingmenu.swfBAK -> place my loadingmenu.swf  in that folder.

Thats all, I hope you like it guys!
author: ElSopa
